synopsis.text: Grandmaster Yuuki enlists the help of Rimuru, a former teacher turned adventurer, to investigate a succession dispute in the Kingdom of Coleus, which lies between the Kingdom of Ingrassia and the Holy Empire of Ruberios. As the conflict escalates between Crown Prince Sauzer and the charismatic Prince Aslan, known as the "Hero Prince of the Desert Heat," Rimuru must go undercover as "Satoru" to gather information and navigate the dangerous web of conspiracies and rebellion. With the local guild divided in their loyalties and demons and vampires lurking in the shadows, Rimuru must use all of his skills to uncover the truth and prevent an all-out war in this tense and thrilling adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
